channel.title: Chat Area and Inventory images showing up black. help!
channel.description:
Hello, I've been attempting to customize my client and somehow I disabled the images for my chat area background and the inventory background they both show up black. the images are not loading and I have no idea how I did this. The images are still in my sprites folder like normal.
[img]http://i1264.photobucket.com/albums/jj492/veraflows/needhelp_zps2058fdaf.png[/img]

item.title: Chat Area and Inventory images showing up black. help!
item.dc:creator: @veraflows veraflows
item.description:
@veraflows wrote:

I fixed it by replacing my sprite.java file with the original. So the problem was in there. Still not entirely sure what!

Read full topic
